metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28018 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Use After Free in smtp_reset in certain situations that may be common for builds with OpenSSL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-base - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-config - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-daemon-light - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
eximon4 - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> trusty/xenial ESM not affected code introduced later

criterions.comment: exim4 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1.2').
